improvement_list.improvement_desc: The initialization of `min_val` to a large number is unnecessary.  It can be initialized to the first element of the first list instead, provided that list is not empty. Add checks for empty lists to avoid potential exceptions.
The condition `pointers[j] < len(lists[j])` could be optimized using a single for loop to iterate through all lists and pointers simultaneously.
The loop terminates when `min_idx` is -1. Consider adding a check before entering the while loop to avoid unnecessary iterations if all pointers are already beyond list boundaries.
The final equality check can be integrated into the main loop, avoiding an extra iteration after the loop completion.
